translation: (537) Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者大目犍連、尊者阿那律住舍衛國手成浴池側。
translation: At the time, Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana and Venerable Anuruddha were staying at the side of a bathing pond in Sāvatthī's hand.

translation: Venerable Śāriputra approached Venerable Anuruddha. Having greeted and comforted him, they sat to one side.

source_sentence: 尊者舍利弗語尊者阿那律言：「奇哉！
translation: Venerable Śāriputra said to Venerable Anuruddha, Marvelous!

source_sentence: 阿那律！

source_sentence: 有大德神力，於何功德修習多修習而能至此？」
translation: If there's great virtue and supernormal power, what merit is cultivated and cultivated so often that it can reach here?

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律語尊者舍利弗言：「於四念處修習多修習，成此大德神力。
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said to Venerable Śāriputra, Cultivate it in the four abodes of mindfulness and cultivate it often enough to attain this great virtuous supernormal power.

source_sentence: 何等為四念處？
translation: What are the four bases of mindfulness?

source_sentence: 內身身觀念處，精勤方便，正念正知，調伏世間貪憂。
translation: The sphere of internal body-body contemplation, which exerts effort and skillful means, with right mindfulness and right knowledge, subdues worldly cravings and sorrow.

source_sentence: 如是外身、內外身，內受、外受、內外受，內心、外心、內外心，內法、外法、內外法觀念處，
translation: Thus, the external body, the internal and external body, internal sensation, external sensation, internal and external sensation, internal mind, external mind, internal and external mind, internal phenomena, external phenomena, and internal and external phenomena are the sphere of contemplation.

source_sentence: 精勤方便，正念正知，如是調伏世間貪憂。
translation: With diligence and skillful means, right mindfulness and right knowledge, they thus subdue worldly cravings and grief.

source_sentence: 尊者舍利弗！
translation: Venerable Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是名四念處修習多修習，成此大德神力。
translation: These are called the cultivation of the four abodes of mindfulness and much cultivation, which accomplishes this great virtuous spiritual power.

source_sentence: 「尊者舍利弗！
translation: Venerable Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我於四念處善修習故，於小千世界少作方便，能遍觀察，如明目士夫於樓觀上，
translation: Because I cultivate these four kinds of mindfulness well, I can contemplate the small chiliocosm with few skillful means and pervade it.

source_sentence: 觀下平地種種之物，我少作方便，觀察小千世界亦復如是。
translation: Observing various things on the ground below, I've done a little bit of skillful means to observe the small thousand worlds in the same way.

source_sentence: 如是我於四念處修習多修習，成此大德神力。」
translation: Thus, I cultivate these four abodes of mindfulness and often cultivate them to achieve this great virtue and supernormal power.

source_sentence: 時，二正士共論議已，各從座起而去。
translation: After they had discussed the matter together, the two upāsaka rose from their seats and departed.

translation: (5Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 尊者舍利弗、尊者大目犍連、尊者阿難、尊者阿那律住舍衛國。
translation: Venerable Śāriputra, Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana, Venerable Ānanda, and Venerable Anavatapta stayed in Sāvatthī.

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者大目犍連詣尊者阿那律所，共相問訊慰勞已，於一面坐。
translation: At that time, Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana approached Venerable Anuruddha. After greeting and comforting him, they sat to one side.

source_sentence: 時，尊者大目犍連問尊者阿那律：「於何功德修習多修習，成此大德神力？」
translation: Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana then asked Venerable Anuruddha, What virtuous cultivation and much cultivation accomplishes this great virtuous supernormal power?

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律語尊者大目犍連：「我於四念處修習多修習，成此大德神力。
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said to Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana, I cultivate and often cultivate these four abodes of mindfulness in order to attain this great virtuous supernormal power.

source_sentence: 何等為四？
translation: What are these four?

source_sentence: 內身身觀繫心住，精勤方便，正念正知，除世間貪憂，外身、內外身，
translation: He observes the mind as bound to body and mind, exerts himself with effort, right mindfulness and right attentiveness, and removes worldly desires and sorrow.

source_sentence: 內受、外受、內外受，內心、外心、內外心，內法、外法、內外法，觀繫心住，
translation: They are internal feelings, external feelings, and internal and external feelings; internal feelings, external feelings, and internal and external feelings; inner feelings, outer feelings, and inner and outer feelings; inward phenomena, outer phenomena, and inner and outer phenomena—they abide by observing the thought-concomitance.

source_sentence: 精進方便，除世間貪憂，是名四念處修習多修習。
translation: These are called the four abodes of mindfulness that are cultivated by exerting effort and skillful means to remove worldly cravings and sorrow, and they often cultivate them.

source_sentence: 成此大德神力，於千須彌山以少方便悉能觀察，如明目士夫登高山頂，
translation: Having perfected this supernatural power of great virtue, he was able to survey the thousand-moon mountains with a little skill in expedient means, just as Mañjuśrī would an ordinary man attain the summit of a high mountain.

source_sentence: 觀下千多羅樹林。
translation: It's below the thousand palm trees under the monastery.

source_sentence: 如是我於四念處修習多修習，成此大德神力，以少方便見千須彌山。
translation: Thus, I cultivate and often cultivate these four abodes of mindfulness, accomplish this great virtuous spiritual power, and with few skillful means see a thousand Sumeru mountains.

source_sentence: 如是，尊者大目犍連！
translation: So it is, Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana!

source_sentence: 我於四念處修習多修習，成此大德神力。」
translation: In the four abodes of mindfulness, I cultivate and often cultivate these great virtues and supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 時二正士共論議已，各從座起而去。
translation: After they had discussed it together, the two men of the assembly rose from their seats and departed.

source_sentence: （五三九）如是我聞：一時，佛住舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: (539) Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 尊者舍利弗、尊者大目犍連、尊者阿難、尊者阿那律住舍衛國手成浴池側。
translation: Venerable Śāriputra, Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana, Venerable Ānanda, and Venerable Anavatapta were staying at the side of a bathing pond in Sāvatthī.

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者阿難往尊者阿那律所，共相問訊慰勞已，於一面坐。
translation: At that time, Venerable Ānanda approached Venerable Anuruddha. Having greeted and comforted him, they sat to one side.

source_sentence: 尊者阿難問尊者阿那律：「於何功德修習多修習，成就如是大德大力大神通？」
translation: Venerable Ānanda asked Venerable Anuruddha, What's the merit of cultivating and often cultivating that accomplishes such great virtue and great supernormal abilities?

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律語尊者阿難：「我於四念處修習多修習，成此大德大力。
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said to Venerable Ānanda, I cultivate these four abodes of mindfulness and often cultivate them, which will make this great virtue so powerful.

source_sentence: 何等為四？
translation: What are these four?

source_sentence: 內身身觀念處繫心住，精勤方便，正念正知，除世間貪憂。
translation: He abides mindfully concentrating on the contemplation of internal body as body, exerting effort and skillful means, right mindfulness and right knowledge, and ridding himself of worldly cravings and sorrow.

source_sentence: 如是外身、內外身，內受、外受、內外受，內心、外心、內外心，內法、外法、內外法觀念處繫心住，
translation: Thus, the external body, internal and external bodies, internal sensation, external sensation, internal and external sensation, internal and external sensation, internal mind, external mind, internal and external mind, internal dharmas, external dharmas, and internal and external dharmas are all concentrated in one’s mind.

source_sentence: 精勤方便，除世間貪憂。
translation: He exerts himself with skillful means to remove worldly cravings and sorrow.

source_sentence: 如是，尊者阿難！
translation: So it is, venerable Ānanda!

source_sentence: 我於此四念處修習多修習，少方便，以淨天眼過天、人眼，見諸眾生，
translation: I cultivate these four abodes of mindfulness and practice them extensively. With few skillful means, I see sentient beings with the pure divine eye, which is superior to that of gods or human beings.

source_sentence: 死時、生時，好色、惡色，上色、下色，善趣、惡趣，隨業受生，皆如實見。
translation: At the time of death and at the time of rebirth, there are good forms and bad forms; higher forms and lower forms; good destinies and bad destinies; birth as a result of action—all they see exactly as they are.

source_sentence: 此諸眾生身惡行，口、意惡行，誹謗賢聖，邪見因緣，身壞命終，生地獄中。
translation: These sentient beings commit bad physical, verbal, and mental actions, denigrate the wise and saintly, and hold wrong views as a cause and condition. At the breaking up of the body at death they are born in hell.

source_sentence: 如是眾生，身善行，口，意善行，不謗賢聖，正見成就，以是因緣，身壞命終，
translation: Good conduct of body, good conduct of speech, and good conduct of thought do not slander the wise and holy. The right view is achieved. Because of these causes and conditions, when the body breaks up and life ends,

source_sentence: 得生天上。
translation: They'll be born in heaven.

source_sentence: 「譬如明目士夫住四衢道，見諸人民若來、若去、若坐、若臥，我亦如是，
translation: “Just as it is when a man with clear eyesight observes people coming and going, sitting and lying down at crossroads in the four directions, similarly I am like this.

source_sentence: 於四念處修習多修習，成此大德大力神通，見諸眾生，死時、生時，善趣、惡趣。
translation: He cultivates the four abodes of mindfulness and often cultivates them, accomplishes this great virtue with great power and supernormal abilities, and sees sentient beings at the time of death and birth in a good or bad destiny.

source_sentence: 如是眾生身惡行，口、意惡行，誹謗賢聖，邪見因緣，生地獄中。
translation: Such sentient beings commit bad physical, verbal, and mental actions, denigrate the wise and saintly, and are born in hell for the sake of wrong views.

source_sentence: 如是眾生身善行，口、意善行，不謗賢聖，正見因緣，身壞命終，得生天上。
translation: Good conduct of body, good conduct of speech, and good conduct of thought by sentient beings in this way do not slander the wise and holy ones. For the sake of right view they will be reborn in heaven when their bodies dissolve and their lives end.

source_sentence: 如是，尊者阿難！
translation: So it is, venerable Ānanda!

source_sentence: 我於四念處修習多修習，成此大德大力神通。」
translation: In the four abodes of mindfulness, I cultivate and often cultivate them to achieve this great virtue and great supernormal power.

source_sentence: 時，二正士共論議已，各從座起而去。
translation: After they had discussed the matter together, the two upāsaka rose from their seats and departed.

source_sentence: （五四〇）如是我聞：一時，佛住舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: (540) Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者阿那律在舍衛國松林精舍，身遭病苦。
translation: At the time, Venerable Anavatapta was staying at the pine forest monastery in Śrāvastī, and his body was suffering from illness.

source_sentence: 時，有眾多比丘詣尊者阿那律所，問訊慰勞已，於一面住，語尊者阿那律言：「尊者阿那律！
translation: At that time, a large group of monks approached Venerable Anuruddha. Having greeted and comforted him, they stood to one side and said to Venerable Anuruddha:

source_sentence: 所患增損可安忍不？
translation: Can we tolerate the increase and decrease of suffering?

source_sentence: 病勢漸損不轉增耶？」
translation: Is the momentum of illness gradually decreasing and not increasing?

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律言：「我病不安，難可安忍，身諸苦痛，轉增無損。」
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said, My illness is unsettled and difficult to bear, and the pain and suffering of my body increases without harm.

source_sentence: 即說三種譬，如上叉摩經說。
translation: That is, it explains three kinds of metaphors, as explained in the above-mentioned sūtra.

source_sentence: 「然我身已遭此苦痛，且當安忍，正念正知。」
translation: Still, my body has suffered this painful pain, so I must tolerate it calmly and with right mindfulness and right knowledge.

source_sentence: 諸比丘問尊者阿那律：「心住何所，而能安忍如是大苦，正念正知？」
translation: The monks asked Venerable Anuruddha, Where does the mind abide that can tolerate such great suffering with right mindfulness and right knowledge?

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律語諸比丘言：「住四念處，我於所起身諸苦痛能自安忍，正念正知。
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said to the monks, Abiding in the four abodes of mindfulness, I can tolerate for myself the pain and suffering that arise from my body with right mindfulness and right knowledge.

source_sentence: 何等為四念處？
translation: What are the four bases of mindfulness?

source_sentence: 謂內身身觀念處，乃至受、心、法觀念處，是名住於四念處，身諸苦痛能自安忍，
translation: These are the four abodes of mindfulness that abide in the contemplation of the body as body internally, up to the contemplation of feelings, mind, and phenomena. These are called the four abodes of mindfulness where one can tolerate all bodily pain with equanimity.

source_sentence: 正念正知。」
translation: Correctly mindful and correctly knowing.

source_sentence: 時，諸正士共論議已，歡喜隨喜，各從座起而去。
translation: After they had discussed the matter together, the monks were delighted and rejoiced, rose from their seats, and departed.

source_sentence: （五四一）如是我聞：一時，佛住舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: (Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 時，尊者阿那律在舍衛國松林精舍，病差未久。
translation: Venerable Anuruddha was staying at the pine forest monastery in Sāvatthī, not long after his illness had passed.

source_sentence: 時，有眾多比丘往詣阿那律所，問訊慰勞已，於一面坐，問尊者阿那律：「安隱樂住不？」
translation: A large group of monks then went to Anavatapta's place, greeted him and comforted him, sat to one side, and asked Venerable Anavatapta, Do you live in peace and comfort?

source_sentence: 阿那律言：「安隱樂住，身諸苦痛漸已休息。」
translation: Aniruddha said, Abiding in peace and comfort, his pain and suffering gradually cease.

source_sentence: 諸比丘問尊者阿那律：「住何所住，身諸苦痛得安隱？」
translation: The monks asked Venerable Anuruddha, Where do you abide and attain peace with pain and suffering in your body?

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律言：「住四念處，身諸苦痛漸得安隱。
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said, Abiding in the four abodes of mindfulness, his body's pain and suffering gradually become peaceful.

source_sentence: 何等為四？
translation: What are these four?

source_sentence: 謂內身身觀念處，乃至法法觀念處，是名四念處。
translation: These are the four abodes of mindfulness that are the contemplation of internal body as body, up to the contemplation of principles as principles.

source_sentence: 住此四念處故，身諸苦痛漸得休息。」
translation: Because they abide in these four abodes of mindfulness, their physical pain and suffering gradually cease.

source_sentence: 時，諸正士共論議已，歡喜隨喜，各從座起而去。
translation: After they had discussed the matter together, the monks were delighted and rejoiced, rose from their seats, and departed.

source_sentence: （五四二）如是我聞：一時，佛住舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: (542) Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 時，尊者阿那律在舍衛國松林精舍。
translation: At the time, Venerable Anuruddha was staying at the pine forest monastery in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 時，有眾多比丘詣尊者阿那律所，共相問訊慰勞已，於一面坐，問尊者阿那律：「若比丘在於學地，
translation: At that time, a large group of monks approached Venerable Anuruddha. Having greeted and comforted each other with greetings, they sat to one side and asked Venerable Anuruddha:

source_sentence: 上求安隱涅槃住，聖弟子云何修習多修習，於此法、律得盡諸漏，無漏心解脫、慧解脫，
translation: How does the noble disciple who abides in peace and nirvana, seeking above, cultivate and often cultivate? In this way he attains cessation of all impure influences with regard to doctrine and restraint. He is liberated by pure mind and liberated by wisdom.

source_sentence: 現法自知作證：『我生已盡，梵行已立，所作已作，自知不受後有。』
translation: In the present life, he knows for himself and realizes, 'My birth has ended, my religious practice has been established, what I've done has been done, and he knows for himself that there won't be a later existence.'

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律語諸比丘言：「若比丘在於學地，上求安隱涅槃心住，聖弟子云何修習多修習？
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said to the monks, If a monk abides in the mind of peaceful nirvāṇa while training and seeks it upward, how does a noble disciple cultivate much cultivation?

source_sentence: 於此法、律得盡諸漏，無漏心解脫、慧解脫，現法自知作證：『我生已盡，
translation: In the present life, he knows and realizes for himself: “Birth of mine has ended.

source_sentence: 梵行已立，所作已作，自知不受後有。』
translation: After the religious practice has been established and what's done, he knows for himself that he won't be subject to later existence.'

source_sentence: 者？
translation: What's the meaning?

source_sentence: 當住四念處。
translation: He should abide in the four abodes of mindfulness.

source_sentence: 何等為四？
translation: What are these four?

source_sentence: 謂內身身觀念處，乃至法法觀念處。
translation: It's the contemplation of internal body as body, up to the contemplation of principles as principles.

source_sentence: 如是四念處修習多修習，於此法、律得盡諸漏，無漏心解脫、慧解脫，
translation: Cultivating these four abodes of mindfulness in many ways, they attain the extinction of contaminants with respect to this doctrine and discipline, uncontaminated liberation of mind and liberation by means of wisdom.

source_sentence: 現法自知作證：『我生已盡，梵行已立，所作已作，自知不受後有。』」
translation: In the present life, he knows and realizes for himself, 'My birth has ended, my religious practice has been established, what I've done has been done, and he knows for himself that there won't be a later existence.'

source_sentence: 時，諸比丘共聞尊者阿那律所說，歡喜隨喜，各從座起而去。
translation: The monks, having heard what Venerable Anuruddha taught together, were delighted and followed him. They each rose from their seats and departed.

source_sentence: （五四三）如是我聞：一時，佛住舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: (54.3) Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 時，尊者阿那律在舍衛國松林精舍住。
translation: At the time, Venerable Anuruddha was staying at the pine forest monastery in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 時，有眾多比丘詣尊者阿那律所，與尊者阿那律共相問訊慰勞已，於一面坐。
translation: Many monks then approached Venerable Anuruddha. Having exchanged greetings and greetings with Venerable Anuruddha, they sat to one side.

source_sentence: 語尊者阿那律言：「若阿羅漢比丘諸漏已盡，所作已作，捨離重擔，離諸有結，
translation: He said to Venerable Anuruddha, Suppose an arhat monk has ended the contaminants, done what should be done, relinquished heavy burdens, and becomes free of the fetters of existence.

source_sentence: 正智心善解脫，亦修四念處耶？」
translation: Is the mind of right knowledge well liberated, and does it also cultivate the four abodes of mindfulness?

source_sentence: 尊者阿那律語比丘言：「若比丘諸漏已盡，所作已作，捨離重擔，離諸有結，
translation: Venerable Anuruddha said to the monk: If a monk has put an end to all the impure influences, done what should be done, relinquished his heavy burden, and become free of the defilements that bind living beings.

source_sentence: 正智心善解脫，彼亦修四念處也。
translation: The mind of right knowledge and good liberation, which also cultivates the four abodes of mindfulness.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 不得者得，不證者證，為現法樂住故。
translation: Those who don't attain it will attain it, and those who don't realize it will realize it because they abide happily in the present life.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 我亦離諸有漏，得阿羅漢，所作已作，心善解脫，亦修四念處故。
translation: I am also free from all the impure ones, having attained arhatship. My deeds have been done and my mind has been well liberated: because I have also cultivated the four foundations of mindfulness.

source_sentence: 不得者得，不到者到，不證者證，乃至現法安樂住。」
translation: Those who don't attain it will attain it, those who don't attain it will arrive, those who don't realize it will realize it, and they'll live in comfort in the present life.

source_sentence: 時，諸正士共論議已，歡喜隨喜，各從座起而去。
